name: Brian Walker
description: Having worked with Talwinder now for more than 10 years I can attest to his deep desire to not only deliver first-class products but to constantly increase his knowledge, skillset and experience. Working with Talwinder is always a pleasure and I can be confident that every project we work together on will be delivered on time and to a high standard. I would have no hesitation in recommending Talwinder to anyone considering employing his services.

name: Antony Zouch
description: Talwinder's knowledge, work ethic and professionalism exceeds expectations. He took time to ensure that he understood the project as much as possible in a few calls and got straight into the work for us, as we had a tight deadline this was a life saver. His code is very well executed and he was always available to ensure that we had everything we needed when closing off the project.
